title: Riot, why don't you guys share full res splash arts?
body:
I don't see why Riot doesn't...is it abusable??
I'm sick of only having 1215 x 717 splash arts...I've found like, only 7 or 8 that are closer to full res...

replies.body: With you there, I want Star Guardian Lux as my wallpaper but I haven't found an image with high enough resolution. I cry many tears.
And plus I sent this as a Riot Support ticket and he told me to put this “issue” on the boards, which I am…so Riot can we get an answer?

There are 2 types of content creators,

The first one is afraid of people stealing their contents all the time.

The second one sees people using his contents as auto advertisements and industry evolutions.

> [{quoted}](name=SEKAI,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=5AsM5GtW,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-05-28T01:54:55.631+0000)
>
> There are 2 types of content creators,
> 
> The first one is afraid of people stealing their contents all the time.
> 
> The second one sees people using his contents as auto advertisements and industry evolutions.

But...I just want them as backgrounds since I got a Mac Retina, 1215 x 717 is horrible...
I mean, my display is 2560 x 1600 and it's not even close to what Riot has offered...
